Class Product

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Product

  • public abstract class Product
extends greenfoot.Actor
    Products that can be interacted by workers to be built and contribute to the war effort.
    Version:
    October 2019
    Author:
    Carl Lam

      Actions to be called every act.
      void build(int inputBuildPoints)
      Adds points to the current build points, and checks to see if the image of the item needs an update based on the new "balance" of points, only when the object is not moving.

      void turnToTrash()
      Turns the object into a bag of trash that goes to the factory edge.
      protected void updateBuildPointLimit()
      Updates the maximum allowable value that the worker can build to, depending on the position of the product.
      protected abstract void updateImage() 
      protected void updateStage()
      Returns the current stage of production that the product is currently in.
      protected void updateXLimit()
      Updates the maximum X position that the product can move to until it finishes it's build stage.

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        Actions to be called every act.
        Overrides:
        act in class greenfoot.Actor

      • build

        public void build(int inputBuildPoints)
        Adds points to the current build points, and checks to see if the image of the item needs an update based on the new "balance" of points, only when the object is not moving.
        Parameters:
        inputBuildPoints - Number of points to add to the object.

      • changeMoveSpeed

        public void changeMoveSpeed(int speed)
        Changes move speed of product. Will not allow for values under 0.
        Parameters:
        speed - The int value to change the speed to.

      • edgeCheck

        protected abstract void edgeCheck()

      • getBuildPoints

        public int getBuildPoints()
        Returns the current build points that the product has.
        Returns:
        The current build points.

      • moveChecker

        protected void moveChecker()
        Checks to see if object has reached its 'limit' for the current stage on the conveyor belt. If it is at the limit, it will not move.

      • turnToTrash

        public void turnToTrash()
        Turns the object into a bag of trash that goes to the factory edge.

      • updateBuildPointLimit

        protected void updateBuildPointLimit()
        Updates the maximum allowable value that the worker can build to, depending on the position of the product. (eg. cannot build up to stage 4 when only at station 2).

      • updateImage

        protected abstract void updateImage()

      • updateStage

        protected void updateStage()
        Returns the current stage of production that the product is currently in.

      • updateXLimit

        protected void updateXLimit()
        Updates the maximum X position that the product can move to until it finishes it's build stage.
